nnsec.net
Class NetIFace.Link

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.net.NetIFace.Link
Enclosing interface:
NetIFace
public static class NetIFace.Link
extends java.lang.Object

Link class is a fundamental piece useful to construct neural networks. Link objects have a weight, an output node (node which link comes from) and an input node (node which link drives to).

Constructor Summary
NetIFace.Link(NetIFace.Node out, NetIFace.Node in)
          Constructs a link without knowledge about weight.
NetIFace.Link(NetIFace.Node out, NetIFace.Node in, double weight)
          Constructs a link with a complete set of parameters.
 
Method Summary
 NetIFace.Node getInputNode()
          Method that permits to know where link drives to.
 NetIFace.Node getOutputNode()
          Method that permits to know where link comes from.
 double getWeight()
          Method that permits to get the weight of the link.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
